content: Choose a new location

[Test] Are you sure you want to move out <color=#d3b037>{搬出NPC}</color>?
<color=#d3b037>{搬出NPC}</color> will move out tomorrow after the request.
Let's proceed if you're ready.
Let me think about it
Confirm Relocation Plan
I want to go back and adjust the relocation plan

[Test] This is <color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color>'s <color=#8AAB4B>placement tool</color>.
Remember to choose a good spot for <color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color> - they can't move in without a location!
You can cancel the moving plans anytime before tomorrow.

[Test] Alright, you've chosen to use a new location.
I'll give you a new <color=#8AAB4B>placement tool</color>.
Once you're ready, let's begin!

[Test] This is <color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color>'s <color=#8AAB4B>placement tool</color>.
Remember to choose a good spot for {搬入NPC}! They won't be able to move in without a proper location.
You can cancel the moving plan anytime before tomorrow arrives.
Let me think about it
Let me think about it

[Test] Application completed.
The relocation will be automatically completed tomorrow.
You can cancel the relocation plan at any time before tomorrow.

[Test] About where to build <color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color>'s house,
would you like to build it at <color=#d3b037>{搬出NPC}</color>'s original location,
or choose a new spot yourself?
Confirm Relocation Plan
Let me think about it

[Test] Application completed.
The relocation will be automatically completed tomorrow.
You can cancel the relocation plan at any time before tomorrow.

[Test] Alright, you've requested to move in <color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color>.
I'll give you a <color=#8AAB4B>placement tool</color>,
Let's begin once you're ready!
【Test】Alright, feel free to come find me if you need anything
Confirm Relocation Plan
Replace in place

【Test】Alright, you've chosen to replace the existing location.
<color=#d3b037>{搬入NPC}</color>'s house will be built directly where <color=#d3b037>{搬出NPC}</color>'s house is.
Let's begin once you're ready!
Confirm Relocation Plan
